pageContent:
MUHSIN KHAN KAMAL 
PLYMOUTH, MN 55447 
603-285-2240 |  afrazmuhsin@gmail.com  |  LinkedIn   | GitHub 
 
PROFILE –  SENIOR FULL STACK QA ENGINEER  
 
Extensive experience (14+) as a Full stack Software QA Engineer in Sonos, Target, Lowes and Tata Consultancy Services and 
lead in quality assurance, validation, and automation testing which includes preparing estimations, strategy, roadmaps, 
defining process, resourcing, metrics collection and identify risks in an agile environment. Experience in feature testing of 
client server-side systems, mobile applications, web applications, backend systems in delivering business value solutions. 
Flexible, able to learn and adapt to new challenges utilizing excellent communication, documentation, presentation, and 
analytical skills to interact with end-users, managers, and technical personnel. Competencies Include: 
Test Automation Frameworks | Accessibility Testing | Agile Practices| Quality Assurance and Test Methodologies | Mobile

Test Automation Frameworks | Accessibility Testing | Agile Practices| Quality Assurance and Test Methodologies | Mobile 
Testing |UI & API Testing| Performance Testing | Data/ ETL Testing| Functional Testing 
Core Competencies and Skills: 
• Java / C# 
• Selenium Webdriver 
• Playwright 
• TestNG 
• Postman 
• Sonar Qube 
• Rest/Soap Services 
• Axe-Core 
• PostgreSQL

• Insurance

PROFESSIONAL EXPERIENCE 
 
SONOS INC CORP, Minneapolis MN   07/2021 – Present 
Software Development Engineer in Test 
Led and oversaw the testing activities for WEB-based professional business music services. Responsible for developing and 
reviewing comprehensive test strategies, test plans, and test cases in Test Rails and automating the test cases using Selenium 
and Jest to ensure the quality and reliability of Web Application. 
• Architected Selenium UI Tests in object-oriented programming concept, reviewed PR, provided feedback, and ran 
tests as GitHub actions for PRs with end-to-end tests coverage of 80%. 
• Managed a team of four skilled testers, provided guidance and mentorship, and fostered a collaborative testing 
environment. Coordinated with cross-functional teams, including developers, UX, product managers, and business

environment. Coordinated with cross-functional teams, including developers, UX, product managers, and business 
stakeholders, to understand requirements and establish testing priorities and strategies. 
• Architected Playwright JavaScript framework and presented to large audience, got approval, and proceeded to 
implementation phase migrating all our test cases. 
• Accountable for product quality, triaging defects, and reporting test progress through dashboards, analyzing Jira Epic 
progress, and presenting insights to key stakeholders.

MUHSIN KHAN KAMAL  PAGE 2 
 
 
• Architected an accessibility automation framework using axe-core in Selenium E2E tests and implemented jest-axe in 
react js application saved lots of time and resources on manual accessibility tests.  
• Contributed to performance testing using JMeter for load and stress testing.  
• Implementing shifting left by writing Jest unit / integration tests by mocking hooks in react JS. 
• Maintained and managed test data efficiently so that automation test scripts successfully run every time. 
• Increased test coverage in Sonar Qube to greater than 75%.  
• Part of hiring team for conducting interviews and on boarded new hires, sped them up on contributing sprint work as 
quickly as possible. 
 
LOWES CORPORATE, Minneapolis MN   06/2020 – 07/2021 
Senior Engineer – Point of Sale Applications 
Developed QA roadmaps, test strategy planning continuous integrations, quality management, test plans, test strategy, defect

Senior Engineer – Point of Sale Applications 
Developed QA roadmaps, test strategy planning continuous integrations, quality management, test plans, test strategy, defect 
triaging mechanisms, Jira Dashboard, automating tests for complex applications involving hardware’s like payment terminal 
and printers.  
• Developed a common Selenium UI framework to use across portfolio. Built lots of reusable methods for automation 
testers easiness.  
• Heavily involved in developing integration API tests using wire mock, groovy and end-to-end tests using Rest-
Assured. Also contributed to Java Spring boot development creating end points and fixing priority bugs and achieved 
API test coverage of more than 75%. 
• Developed manual and automated tests for point-of-sale application involving complex hardware’s like registers, 
Verifone, and printers. 
• Analyzed applications, designed performance test scripts, executed, and reported results in JMeter. Determined

Verifone, and printers. 
• Analyzed applications, designed performance test scripts, executed, and reported results in JMeter. Determined 
system bottlenecks and enhanced performance enhancements. 
• Provided constructive feedback for PR’s by making sure best practices were followed as per team guidelines.  
• Created smoke test suite and automated with the coverage of above 80%. 
• Coordinate with pipeline team to establish CI/CD pipeline for running E2E automation tests in Jenkins. 
• Contributed as part of on call schedule by monitoring the alerts in slack, debugging logs, understand the root cause of 
the issue and escalating the issues with respective team.  
TARGET CORPORATION, Minneapolis MN  03/2016 – 06/2020 
Senior Engineer - Point of Sale / Mobile Point of Sale / Last Mile  
Key Participant in a big migration project from old monolithic to microservices platform.  
• Automated the old monolithic POS application using C# coded UI framework.

Key Participant in a big migration project from old monolithic to microservices platform.  
• Automated the old monolithic POS application using C# coded UI framework.  
• Contributed to angular mobile application runs on Zebra TC51 device. Automated test cases through protractor 
framework with JavaScript. 
• Worked on Kafka environment to get transportation data from USPS, UPS, FedEx and validated microservices which 
consumes and process the driver details for Last Mile Application.  
• Developed Integration tests by mocking the stubs which enables testability and stability of Kafka.  
• Owned Java spring boot services for generating receipts. Also collaborate with checkout platform team which 
consolidates data from different teams across corporate like item, price, and tax. 
• Created smoke test postman collection for microservices that we develop and maintain. 
• Developed and used SQL scripts in Flyway / PostgreSQL DB as test data for validating End to End functionalities for

• Developed and used SQL scripts in Flyway / PostgreSQL DB as test data for validating End to End functionalities for 
SpringBoot microservices applications. 
• Monitored services stability using Grafana dashboard for mobile checkout.  
• Developed Uber dashboard for collecting metrics across point-of-sale portfolio using Grafana. 
• Proactively alerts the slack if there are any crashes in the app before customer escalation. 
• Contributed to the on-call rotation, analyze the logs, and provide temporary solution for P1/P2 issues to team 
members and work on resolution by collaborating with respective teams. 
• Worked on writing unit tests using Spock and integration testing with wire mock.  
• Automated E2E test cases with Rest Assured and Cucumber in BDD format.

MUHSIN KHAN KAMAL  PAGE 3 
 
 
• Learned On call support from different teams internally within Target, troubleshot the issues with logs and responded 
within the time based on the priority.  
• Testing in Labs and Live testing at stores, along with team members, were great experiences gained here. 
 
TATA CONSULTANCY SERVICES, Portsmouth NH  02/2013 – 03/2016 
IT Analyst – Liberty Mutual Insurance  
Developed test plans, test automation, defect triaging mechanisms, status reports for all projects worked across the company. 
Involved in organization level initiatives like core-automation team, mentoring juniors. 
• Managed in-house offshore testing team for project timelines and estimations including assigning tasks to juniors and 
getting the status ready for the clients before the scrum meetings and arrange defect triages as needed. 
• Developed Automation tool to upload test cases to TFS which was used by QA team for test case management.

• Developed Automation tool to upload test cases to TFS which was used by QA team for test case management. 
• Developed Batch automation tool which ran over 200 business rules in a matter of 45 minutes by creating a batch file 
which saved hours of testing efforts and resources.  
• Developed SQL scripts for creating data for test environment and clearing out once testing is done without impacting 
the application for claims processing application.  
• Scheduled Go No Go meeting with PM and BA leads to discuss risk and bug reporting before product release. 
 
IT Analyst – Worker Compensation Financial Rating Bureau                                   04/2011 – 02/2013 
Involved in digital transformation of migrating mainframe application to dot net application with web services which 
determines premium for other insurance companies.  
• Automated batch file business rules and lead quality testing team in Chennai

determines premium for other insurance companies.  
• Automated batch file business rules and lead quality testing team in Chennai  
• Worked on Rating and billing systems involving financial transactions. 
• Design and review test cases for business rules and review with Business Analysts 
• Traceability Matrix for mapping requirements with test cases  
• Sending test results and reports to stakeholders  
 
IT Analyst – Talk-Talk Telecom Ltd                                  03/2009 – 04/2011 
Worked as manual QA Tester for telecom-based company. 
• Learned all the manual test design techniques.  
• Preparing estimation with requirements documents and presenting to onsite counter parts. 
• Test execution and filing defects at Bugzilla.  
• Making sure we have all the nest practices for quality checks internally in TCS. 
 
EDUCATION 
 
Bachelor of Engineering, Electronics and Communication Engineering, NOORUL ISLAM COLLEGE OF TECHNOLOGY (ANNA UNIVERSITY), 
Chennai, India
